item.title: Rubbish tipped on pavement and road, 26th November
item.description:
Seems a wheelie bin has fallen over and all rubbish all over pavement and rod, near numbers 72 and 74. Been there a few days. Would be so grateful for a cleanup not to attract rodents and diseases!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millmark Grove, New Cross, Greater London

item.title: Household waste on Long Walk footpath, outside bin store - south end, 26th November
item.description:
There is household waste in the middle of the footpath, outside of the bin store at the southern end of Long Walk. This was spilt by the refuse team when emptying the communal bins. Please can they be instructed to pick up any waste they drop when carrying out their work.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eglinton Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet
